data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Libertador General Bernardo O‘Higgins, Chile.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Libertador General Bernardo O‘Higgins, Chile
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 195,999 believers in Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 655,401 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary: On average, 83 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Libertador General Bernardo O‘Higgins, Chile.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, move the 195,999 believers in the state of Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Pashtun, Northern people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.section_summary:
the state of Libertador General Bernardo O‘Higgins, Chile has a population of 851,400.

We estimate Libertador General Bernardo O'Higgins has 195,999 people who might know Jesus, 545,842 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 109,559 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Libertador General Bernardo O‘Higgins, Chile to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
